snippet.title: Realm of Ink - Exclusive Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Get your first look at the just-announced Realm of Ink, a 2.5D roguelite that blends traditional Chinese ink painting art style with modern art design to create a unique look for this game that touches on the philosophical significance of life as one of its themes and lets you evolve your Ink Pet companions. It is due to be released in Q1 2024 for PC and consoles.

#IGN #Gaming #RealmOfInk
